title: Town of Ithaca's Energy Code Supplement (IECS) - Town of Ithaca
cleaned_text: Town of Ithaca's Energy Code Supplement (IECS) The purpose of the Ithaca Energy Code Supplement is to promote the public health, safety, and general welfare by establishing a local energy code supplement for all new construction, certain additions, and major renovations, with requirements above and beyond the state energy code that will become more stringent over time.
